    Vaults, Files, Datasets and Objects

    vaults_and_objects.Rmd

    TL;DR 

    library(quartzbio.edp)
Sys.getenv('EDP_PROFILE')
#> [1] ""
Sys.setenv(EDP_PROFILE = 'vsim-dev_rw')
Sys.getenv('EDP_PROFILE')
#> [1] "vsim-dev_rw"

vlts <- Vaults()
#> Loading required package: RcppSimdJson
#> GET https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v1/user...
#> Connected to https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio with user "Marc Lamarine" using an API Token
#> GET https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/vaults...
u <- User()
#> GET https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v1/user...
u$first_name
#> [1] "Marc"
vme <- Vault_create(paste0('vault_', u$first_name))
#> POST https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/vaults...

Vault(id = vme)
#> GET https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/vaults/2396...
#> Vault "vsim-dev:vault_Marc" ("", general, RWA), @ "Marc Lamarine", updated at:2023-05-24T08:58:02.727Z
Folder_create(vme, 'data/cyto')
#> GET https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/objects...
#> POST https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/objects...
#> POST https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/objects...
#> folder "vsim-dev:vault_Marc:/data/cyto" (application/vnd.solvebio.folder) nb:0 user:Marc Lamarine accessed:2023-05-24T08:58:03.571Z
Folder_create(vme, 'data/flow')
#> GET https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/objects...
#> POST https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/objects...
#> folder "vsim-dev:vault_Marc:/data/flow" (application/vnd.solvebio.folder) nb:0 user:Marc Lamarine accessed:2023-05-24T08:58:03.941Z
Folder_create(vme, 'source/code')
#> GET https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/objects...
#> POST https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/objects...
#> POST https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/objects...
#> folder "vsim-dev:vault_Marc:/source/code" (application/vnd.solvebio.folder) nb:0 user:Marc Lamarine accessed:2023-05-24T08:58:04.472Z
Folders(vault_id=vme)
#> GET https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/objects...
#> EDP List of 5 Objects
#>           path object_type vault_name     user_name            last_modified
#> 1        /data      folder vault_Marc Marc Lamarine 2023-05-24T08:58:03.384Z
#> 2   /data/cyto      folder vault_Marc Marc Lamarine 2023-05-24T08:58:03.571Z
#> 3   /data/flow      folder vault_Marc Marc Lamarine 2023-05-24T08:58:03.941Z
#> 4      /source      folder vault_Marc Marc Lamarine 2023-05-24T08:58:04.282Z
#> 5 /source/code      folder vault_Marc Marc Lamarine 2023-05-24T08:58:04.472Z

delete(vme)
#> DELETE https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/vaults/2396...
#> Vault "vsim-dev:vault_Marc" ("", general, rwa), @ "Marc Lamarine", updated at:2023-05-24T08:58:04.847Z

    User 

    library(quartzbio.edp)
# select an EDP instance using a profile

u <- User()
#> GET https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v1/user...
u$first_name
#> [1] "Marc"
u$last_name
#> [1] "Lamarine"
u$full_name
#> [1] "Marc Lamarine"
u$id
#> [1] 71
u$email
#> [1] "marc.lamarine@precisionformedicine.com"
u$account$name
#> [1] "vsim-dev"
u$url
#> [1] "https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v1/users/71"

    Vaults 

    library(quartzbio.edp)
# select an EDP instance using a profile
Sys.setenv(EDP_PROFILE = 'vsim-dev_rw')
# fetch personnal vault info
myV <- Vault()
#> GET https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v1/user...
#> GET https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/vaults...
# personal vault: user-id
myV$name
#> [1] "user-71"
myV$full_path 
#> [1] "vsim-dev:user-71"
myV$has_children  
#> [1] TRUE
myV$has_folder_children
#> [1] TRUE
myV$user$full_name
#> [1] "Marc Lamarine"
myV$permissions
#> $read
#> [1] TRUE
#> 
#> $write
#> [1] TRUE
#> 
#> $admin
#> [1] FALSE

    Vault creation 

    # create a vault
v <- Vault_create('vault_test_1', description = 'test_1', tags = list('tag1', 'tag2'))
#> POST https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/vaults...
v$name
#> [1] "vault_test_1"
v$full_path
#> [1] "vsim-dev:vault_test_1"

# retrieve a vault by name
Vault(name = 'vault_test_1')
#> GET https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/vaults...
#> Vault "vsim-dev:vault_test_1" ("test_1", general, RWA), @ "Marc Lamarine", updated at:2023-05-24T08:58:05.696Z

# retrieve a vault by full_path
Vault(full_path = v$full_path)
#> GET https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/vaults...
#> Vault "vsim-dev:vault_test_1" ("test_1", general, RWA), @ "Marc Lamarine", updated at:2023-05-24T08:58:05.696Z

v$description
#> [1] "test_1"
v$metadata
#> NULL
v$tags
#> [[1]]
#> [1] "tag1"
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] "tag2"

# update metadata
new_name <- 'test_one'
v2 <- Vault_update(v, 
      name = new_name, 
      description = 'barabor', 
      metadata = list(meta_1 = 'foo'), 
      storage_class = 'Performance', tags = 'tag_A')
#> PUT https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/vaults/2397...

v3 <- update(v2, storage_class = 'Temporary')
#> PUT https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/vaults/2397...

    Vaults listing, limit and paging

    • Vaults are ordered per locale “LC_TIME”, “us”
    • Intermediate pages can sized using limit
    • fetch_next and fetch_all use that limit
    # get the firt two ordered vaults
vs1 <- Vaults(limit = 2, page = 1)
#> GET https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/vaults...

# get the the third and fourth vault
Vaults(limit = 2, page = 2)
#> GET https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/vaults...
#> List of 2 Vaults
#>     id            name                full_path      user_name vault_type
#> 1   19          Public         quartzbio:Public Admin Dev user    general
#> 2 1300 Public Data Dev vsim-dev:Public Data Dev   David Caplan    general
#>                 created_at
#> 1 2022-11-02T23:38:43.735Z
#> 2 2023-02-15T20:07:31.859Z

# same as above
vs2 <- fetch_next(vs1)
#> GET https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/vaults...
vs2
#> List of 2 Vaults
#>     id            name                full_path      user_name vault_type
#> 1   19          Public         quartzbio:Public Admin Dev user    general
#> 2 1300 Public Data Dev vsim-dev:Public Data Dev   David Caplan    general
#>                 created_at
#> 1 2022-11-02T23:38:43.735Z
#> 2 2023-02-15T20:07:31.859Z

# fetch all remaining vaults by pages of size 2
all_vlts <- fetch_all(vs1)
#> GET https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/vaults...
#> GET https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/vaults...
#> GET https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/vaults...
#> got all results.
all_vlts_df <- as.data.frame(all_vlts)

# delete vault
delete(v)
#> DELETE https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/vaults/2397...
#> Vault "vsim-dev:test_one" ("barabor", general, rwa), @ "Marc Lamarine", updated at:2023-05-24T08:58:07.804Z

    Folders 

    # list all folders in an account
all_folders <- Folders()
#> GET https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/objects...

# get first four
Folders(limit = 4)
#> GET https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/objects...
#> EDP List of 4 Objects
#>                      path object_type      vault_name    user_name
#> 1                /ClinGen      folder Public Data Dev David Caplan
#> 2                /ClinVar      folder          Public David Caplan
#> 3 /ClinVar/5.2.0-20210110      folder          Public David Caplan
#> 4 /ClinVar/5.2.0-20221105      folder          Public David Caplan
#>              last_modified
#> 1 2023-02-15T20:07:39.539Z
#> 2 2022-11-10T19:46:56.464Z
#> 3 2022-11-10T19:47:11.142Z
#> 4 2022-11-10T20:32:55.867Z

# create folder with description and tags
v1 <- Vault_create('_an_upload',  description = 'upload', tags = list('fake', 'can_be_removed'))
#> POST https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/vaults...
fdata <- Folder_create(v1, 'data')
#> POST https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/objects...
fdata
#> folder "vsim-dev:_an_upload:/data" (application/vnd.solvebio.folder) nb:0 user:Marc Lamarine accessed:2023-05-24T08:58:08.919Z

# CAUTION, no overwritting per default, folders are renamed incrementally
# a new folder data-1 is created
Folder_create(v1, 'data')
#> POST https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/objects...
#> folder "vsim-dev:_an_upload:/data-1" (application/vnd.solvebio.folder) nb:0 user:Marc Lamarine accessed:2023-05-24T08:58:09.096Z

# create a hierarchy
Folder_create(v1, 'source/code')
#> GET https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/objects...
#> POST https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/objects...
#> POST https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/objects...
#> folder "vsim-dev:_an_upload:/source/code" (application/vnd.solvebio.folder) nb:0 user:Marc Lamarine accessed:2023-05-24T08:58:09.668Z

# List folders of a given vault - recursive
Folders(vault_id = v1)
#> GET https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/objects...
#> EDP List of 4 Objects
#>           path object_type vault_name     user_name            last_modified
#> 1        /data      folder _an_upload Marc Lamarine 2023-05-24T08:58:08.919Z
#> 2      /data-1      folder _an_upload Marc Lamarine 2023-05-24T08:58:09.096Z
#> 3      /source      folder _an_upload Marc Lamarine 2023-05-24T08:58:09.413Z
#> 4 /source/code      folder _an_upload Marc Lamarine 2023-05-24T08:58:09.668Z

# List folders using regex on paths - recursive
Folders(regex = '^/data')
#> GET https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/objects...
#> EDP List of 3 Objects
#>        path object_type vault_name     user_name            last_modified
#> 1     /data      folder _an_upload Marc Lamarine 2023-05-24T08:58:08.919Z
#> 2   /data-1      folder _an_upload Marc Lamarine 2023-05-24T08:58:09.096Z
#> 3 /datasets      folder    user-71 Marc Lamarine 2023-05-10T10:30:47.391Z
Folders(regex = 'code$')
#> GET https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/objects...
#> EDP List of 2 Objects
#>           path object_type vault_name     user_name            last_modified
#> 1     /GENCODE      folder     Public  David Caplan 2022-11-13T01:24:41.193Z
#> 2 /source/code      folder _an_upload Marc Lamarine 2023-05-24T08:58:09.668Z

# List folders matching paths - recursive
Folders(query = 'code')
#> GET https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/objects...
#> EDP List of 1 Objects
#>           path object_type vault_name     user_name            last_modified
#> 1 /source/code      folder _an_upload Marc Lamarine 2023-05-24T08:58:09.668Z

# fetch a a folder from a given vault
Folder(vault_id = v1, path = 'data')
#> GET https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/objects...
#> folder "vsim-dev:_an_upload:/data" (application/vnd.solvebio.folder) nb:0 user:Marc Lamarine accessed:2023-05-24T08:58:08.919Z

# fetch a folder with its full.path
Folder(full_path = fdata$full_path)
#> GET https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/objects...
#> folder "vsim-dev:_an_upload:/data" (application/vnd.solvebio.folder) nb:0 user:Marc Lamarine accessed:2023-05-24T08:58:08.919Z
delete(v1)
#> DELETE https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/vaults/2398...
#> Vault "vsim-dev:_an_upload" ("upload", general, rwa), @ "Marc Lamarine", updated at:2023-05-24T08:58:11.266Z

    Files

    Upload and Download

    upload CSV 

    irisp <- file.path(tempdir(), 'iris.csv')
write.csv(iris[1:10,], irisp)

v <- Vault_create('_iris_upload',  description = 'upload', 
  tags = list('iris', 'can_be_removed'))
#> POST https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/vaults...

vpath <- 'data/iris/v1/iris_10.csv'

# File upload: folder hierarchy is created on the fly
firis <- File_upload(v, irisp, vpath )
#> GET https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/objects...
#> GET https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/objects...
#> GET https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/objects...
#> POST https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/objects...
#> POST https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/objects...
#> POST https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/objects...
#> POST https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/objects...
#> uploading file /tmp/RtmpVeCRwr/iris.csv...
firis$full_path
#> [1] "vsim-dev:_iris_upload:/data/iris/v1/iris_10.csv"
firis$path
#> [1] "/data/iris/v1/iris_10.csv"
firis$md5
#> [1] "14f700477f0105443bd294683f270a58"

# File download
File_download(firis, file.path(dirname(irisp), 'iris_10_download.csv')) 
#> GET https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/objects/2050696666792134147/download...
#> Response [https://qb-edp-dev.s3.amazonaws.com/uploads/3/2050696666920254022?response-content-disposition=attachment%3B%20filename%3Diris_10.csv&AWSAccessKeyId=ASIAUY4D3D27PKSBNB7X&Expires=1685005094&x-amz-security-token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjEMH%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FwEaCXVzLWVhc3QtMSJGMEQCIAgRHk20wT2QmQaWwanj6ymJmh4w%2BFLJInsFaiHIrHB8AiAdatcGad%2B7RusCuKqt%2FgtN3pQv6%2BI5DxsxXJZzlewediqGBAjq%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F8BEAMaDDMyODMwNDYzMTQ4NiIMVtmb41%2BR7QRv2R3BKtoDP4wKzJb4Smnr%2BXzMwJmvcYRUJ9KEt5sSBS4P%2FhbSMrPmku4wyRzenqMRnv22cMytnm3FNldaWrAHB933%2Fixn4by0hRy092kp4dNVi%2BbvuIIofRv6fjmti9Zb9npgFQkjSu%2F%2B4O9ROab4to5loltji%2BYzgwAkYyeQJm%2FhzraYkNYcDgPU97n%2Fcr3FShLbedYPX%2FR8SN2nTOKou9acjrtC9qN4%2Fi4Rrml64mFAsRTssuJjAYc%2FD3x%2FNevXwms%2Ff3Ux7h1smqJp1Sgzk08G3viYadE7H7e7urTJMrhmF%2Bp8sdgW%2FxmsGG3ACbQVmi1c%2BN5Dv1TlFQ%2BrLHtuYY0zSoupuK%2BsUV7YTM%2BP%2FOBtkK%2BK0U%2BqtAKnfQVzg8UfoLm1jXszWKjFsmxOeSxIUdDWl%2BBzt31YERjJJSlUsfVadTj5cid5C%2BekQuPqZplCBmNBMoFKz92Sb88S0gzYrrXKTJIAIoAUKOVb65BLI8Mh55LPnTAgC1VMoXEhKuy5OtahBv4AEJ8fX1WtNcingGuPDqKxt%2BdOhHM%2FSrh4PtOQImKmwqkB3i9kKxUIraHm6qkb03XT4QKev6im7UwXdwJteP9krgMokHY6yRH8tecPwH0cGm6m5034XvE7E9bbMJCbt6MGOqYBUbufuVY%2BGU8Y9BVfmZi9pj1khs156q4r13QawoDBV3cBDOdY8O6PUrIR8UcKAKdGTNBa3QCmR8CL2NH4sX01miqKKKjnd2YmUWkL3OBmCRaR0cAenGDnrqpMQ3LuUdcYy94TMWfRuWicZEyIV4URJ828w2uZEVweVyjnDa328p8F7y4pCNqOQtNgP97bmiwP43S91mTdTS%2BiDGcKSaaLS7EvLLaXlw%3D%3D&Signature=B6f4G09v%2FK%2BKHAEEMSNdte2oDQE%3D]
#>   Date: 2023-05-24 08:58
#>   Status: 200
#>   Content-Type: text/csv
#>   Size: 356 B
#> <ON DISK>  /tmp/RtmpVeCRwr/iris_10_download.csv
dir(dirname(irisp), 'iris')
#> [1] "iris.csv"             "iris_10_download.csv"

# fetch a File object
File( full_path = firis$full_path)
#> GET https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/objects...
#> file "vsim-dev:_iris_upload:/data/iris/v1/iris_10.csv" (text/csv) nb:0 user:Marc Lamarine accessed:2023-05-24T08:58:14.556Z
firis
#> file "vsim-dev:_iris_upload:/data/iris/v1/iris_10.csv" (text/csv) nb:0 user:Marc Lamarine accessed:2023-05-24T08:58:12.727Z

    upload JSONL

    The JSON Lines text format, also called newline-delimited JSON. JSON Lines is a convenient format for storing structured data that may be processed one record at a time. * JSONL or ndjson)

    
  # upload jsonl file
irisj <- file.path(tempdir(), "iris.json")

# stream_out function write the JSONL format to a connection
jsonlite:::stream_out(iris[1:15, ], file(irisj))
#> opening file output connection.
#> 
Complete! Processed total of 15 rows.
#> closing file output connection.

vpath <- "v1/iris_10.json"
fi2 <- File_upload(v, irisj, vpath)
#> GET https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/objects...
#> POST https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/objects...
#> POST https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/objects...
#> uploading file /tmp/RtmpVeCRwr/iris.json...
fi2$path
#> [1] "/v1/iris_10.json"
fi2$mimetype
#> [1] "application/json"

File_query(fi2)
#> fetching the number of rows of the file...
#> GET https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/objects/2050696690616849896...
#> found  lines
#> POST https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/objects/2050696690616849896/data...
#>    Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width Species
#> 1           5.1         3.5          1.4         0.2  setosa
#> 2           4.9         3.0          1.4         0.2  setosa
#> 3           4.7         3.2          1.3         0.2  setosa
#> 4           4.6         3.1          1.5         0.2  setosa
#> 5           5.0         3.6          1.4         0.2  setosa
#> 6           5.4         3.9          1.7         0.4  setosa
#> 7           4.6         3.4          1.4         0.3  setosa
#> 8           5.0         3.4          1.5         0.2  setosa
#> 9           4.4         2.9          1.4         0.2  setosa
#> 10          4.9         3.1          1.5         0.1  setosa
#> 11          5.4         3.7          1.5         0.2  setosa
#> 12          4.8         3.4          1.6         0.2  setosa
#> 13          4.8         3.0          1.4         0.1  setosa
#> 14          4.3         3.0          1.1         0.1  setosa
#> 15          5.8         4.0          1.2         0.2  setosa
File_query(fi2, filters = filters("Sepal.Length >= 5"))
#> POST https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/objects/2050696690616849896/data...
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width Species
#> 1          5.1         3.5          1.4         0.2  setosa
#> 2          5.0         3.6          1.4         0.2  setosa
#> 3          5.4         3.9          1.7         0.4  setosa
#> 4          5.0         3.4          1.5         0.2  setosa
#> 5          5.4         3.7          1.5         0.2  setosa
#> 6          5.8         4.0          1.2         0.2  setosa

    Files Listing

    Works as vaults and folders using the same criteria for filtering and the same fetch_next, fetch_all functions.

    all_files <- as.data.frame(Files())
#> GET https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/objects...

Files(limit = 3)
#> GET https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/objects...
#> EDP List of 3 Objects
#>                                                                                 path
#> 1                                                                    /bm_mut_cnv.csv
#> 2                                                                   /boss_3.4_iris.R
#> 3 /ClinGen/ClinGen-1-0-0-2015-06-02-Genes-1098056416333778650-20230215200640.json.gz
#>   object_type      vault_name     user_name            last_modified
#> 1        file         user-71 Marc Lamarine 2023-05-10T10:30:07.085Z
#> 2        file         user-71 Marc Lamarine 2023-02-08T13:15:36.980Z
#> 3        file Public Data Dev  David Caplan 2023-02-15T20:07:46.945Z

Files(regex = 'TCG*')
#> GET https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/objects...
#> EDP List of 2 Objects
#>                                                                              path
#> 1 /TCGA/2.0.0-2018-mc3-v0.2.8/TCGA-mc3.v0.2.8.PUBLIC.LAML_PATCH.maf.oncokb.txt.gz

    Files Move 

    # move file from v1/ to v2/
f1 <- Folder_create(vault_id=v, '/data/iris/v2')
#> GET https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/objects...
#> POST https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/objects...
firis_v2 <- Object_update(firis, parent_object_id = f1$id)
#> PUT https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/objects/2050696666792134147...
firis_v2
#> file "vsim-dev:_iris_upload:/data/iris/v2/iris_10.csv" (text/csv) nb:10 user:Marc Lamarine accessed:2023-05-24T08:58:14.556Z

    Files Querying

    Columns, Rows of objects that are tabular can be obtained

    # fetch the two first rows
f2r <- File_query(firis_v2, limit=2)
#> fetching the number of rows of the file...
#> GET https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/objects/2050696666792134147...
#> found 10 lines
#> POST https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/objects/2050696666792134147/data...

# fetch the two next ones
fetch_next(f2r)
#> POST https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/objects/2050696666792134147/data...
#>     Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width Species
#> 1 3          4.7         3.2          1.3         0.2  setosa
#> 2 4          4.6         3.1          1.5         0.2  setosa

# fetch row 8
File_query(firis_v2, limit=1,  offset=7)
#> fetching the number of rows of the file...
#> GET https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/objects/2050696666792134147...
#> found 10 lines
#> POST https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/objects/2050696666792134147/data...
#>     Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width Species
#> 1 8            5         3.4          1.5         0.2  setosa
iris[8,]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width Species
#> 8            5         3.4          1.5         0.2  setosa

# fetch all Setosa 
File_query(firis_v2, filters= filters('Species contains "setosa"'))
#> POST https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/objects/2050696666792134147/data...
#>       Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width Species
#> 1   1          5.1         3.5          1.4         0.2  setosa

#> 4   4          4.6         3.1          1.5         0.2  setosa

#> 9   9          4.4         2.9          1.4         0.2  setosa
#> 10 10          4.9         3.1          1.5         0.1  setosa
File_query(firis_v2, filters= filters('Sepal.Length = 4.7'))
#> POST https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/objects/2050696666792134147/data...

    Create and Import from a record lists 

    genes_1 <- Dataset_create(v, 'genes.ds', 
  description = "genes hits",
  metadata = list(DEV = TRUE), 
  tags = list("QBP", "EDP"), 
  storage_class = "Temporary", capacity = "small")
#> POST https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/objects...

records <- list(
  list(gene = "CFTR", importance = 1, sample_count = 2104),
  list(gene = "BRCA2", importance = 1, sample_count = 1391),
  list(gene = "CLIC2", importance = 5, sample_count = 14)
)

import_res <- Dataset_import(genes_1, records = records, sync = TRUE)

    Modify records with python expression 

    nobs <- Dataset_create(v, 'dna_gurus.ds')
#> POST https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/objects...
authors <- list(
    list(name='Francis Crick'),
    list(name='James Watson'),
    list(name='Rosalind Franklin')
)
# additional firt and last name fields to be created
target_fields <- list(
  list(
    name="first_name",
    description="Adds a first name column based on name column",
    data_type="string",
    expression="record.name.split(' ')[0]"
  ),
  list(
    name="last_name",
    description="Adds a last name column based on name column",
    data_type="string",
    expression="record.name.split(' ')[-1]"
  )
)
res <- Dataset_import(nobs, records = authors, 
  target_fields = target_fields, 
  sync = TRUE)
#> POST https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/dataset_imports...
#> GET https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/tasks/2050697081813518503...
#> waiting for task 2050697081813518503 ("Dataset Import" for "vsim-dev:_iris_upload:/dna_gurus.ds"),  29 retries left
#> GET https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/tasks/2050697081813518503...
#> GET https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/tasks...
#> GET https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/tasks/2050697093049462868...
#> waiting for task 2050697093049462868 ("Dataset Commit" for "vsim-dev:_iris_upload:/dna_gurus.ds"),  28 retries left
#> GET https://vsim-dev.api.edp.aws.quartz.bio/v2/tasks/2050697093049462868...

# Keep fields

  fields = c('Petal.Width', 'Species'),
  filters= filters('(Sepal.Length >= 5.1) OR  (Sepal.Width <= 3.0)'))

   ordering = 'Sepal.Length')
